entities.name: snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is mentioned as the one who wants to stop Harry Potter for his own safety. He is described as having a voice of forced calm.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as someone who has an unfortunate habit of wandering around after hours.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Professor Moody is mentioned as the one who is questioning Snape's intentions and trying to get an egg from Filch.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Argus Filch is mentioned as someone who is clutching an egg tightly and refusing to give it to Moody.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is mentioned as the one who stole an egg from the champion.

relationships.description: Moody asks Filch to hand over an egg.
Snape is concerned about Potter's safety and wants him stopped.
